name: Join Up
description:
This game was originally made for GMTK Game Jam 2021

_____________________________________________________________________________

The theme was JOINED TOGETHER.

_____________________________________________________________________________

Touch friendly yellow characters to put them on your side, and when you have enough manpower, destroy the ones who were trying to destroy you....

_____________________________________________________________________________

How to play :-

1) Click to start the game

2) Move around with the WASD or arrow keys

3) Touch friendly yellow characters to put them on your side

4) Avoid the bullets as they decrease your manpower

5) When you have enough characters on your side, the screen will glow yellow and you will have the ability to destroy the enemies by touching them.
